title: [199. Binary Tree Right Side View](https://leetcode.cn/problems/binary-tree-right-side-view/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
199. Binary Tree Right Side View Description Given the root of a binary tree, imagine yourself standing on the right side of it, return the values of the nodes you can see ordered from top to bottom.
 
Example 1:
Input: root = [1,2,3,null,5,null,4] Output: [1,3,4] Example 2:
Input: root = [1,null,3] Output: [1,3] Example 3:
Input: root = [] Output: []  
Constraints:
The number of nodes in the tree is in the range [0, 100]. -100 <= Node.val <= 100 Related Topics Tree Depth-First Search Breadth-First Search Binary Tree Similar Questions Populating Next Right Pointers in Each Node Boundary of Binary Tree
